page.title: 11OGBOURNE QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: {These were sent to each house in the {village, 50% were collected back again Modal no. of people in a house:{2 Modal age group:{22-40 Occupations were mainly{manual}jobs Modal no.of fulltime jobs per house:{1 The majority of these jobs were{local {Less than 10%}were 2nd homes Modal length of occupation was{13 yrs Most food was bought in{Marlborough Most people had come from a town{more {than 20 miles}away in southern England {3%}of homes were bungalows Modal no. of rooms per house:{10+ {94%}of homes had a seperate kitchen {97%}had a seperate bath/shower room {100%}of homes had an inside toilet {66%}were owner occupied,{15%}rented privately,{15%}local authority rented Modal age of houses:{11-50 & 200+ yrs {Over 1/2}villagers do not use the bus service.Those that do, use it{weekly.
